Name: SimpleBreakableDeleteShadowObj
Notes: A basic object that can be destroyed through various means. Unlike other variants, its shadows will be invalidated after destroying it. The supported methods to destroy a certain object are hardcoded. It needs the animation Break.bck that will be used when the object gets destroyed. In addition, it also supports an optional visibility animation called Break.bva. Finally, it may use sound or particle effects when it gets destroyed. These go by the names MapObjActorBreak and Break, respectively.

Obj_arg0.Name: Color Frame
Obj_arg0.Description: If ColorChange.brk exists, this will define the color frame to be used.

Obj_arg1.Name: Texture Frame
Obj_arg1.Description: If TexChange.btp/.btk exists, this will define the texture frame to be used.

Obj_arg2.Name: Shadow Length
Obj_arg2.Description: If Shadow.bcsv exists, this defines the shadow's drop length.

Obj_arg3.Name: Item Type
Obj_arg3.Description: The kind of item to spawn when destroyed.

Obj_arg4.Name: Riddle SFX Type
Obj_arg4.Description: Specifies what sound effect to play after destroying the object. Although the game reads this value, the jingle functionality has been removed in SMG2.

Obj_arg5.Name: Cutscene Breaking Delay
Obj_arg5.Description: The time in frames that has to elapse before the object gets destroyed when its cutscene is playing. Default is 60.

Obj_arg6.Name: Item Count
Obj_arg6.Description: The number of items to spawn when destroyed. Default is 1 for Coins and 5 for Star Bits.

Obj_arg7.Name: SW_DEAD Activation Delay
Obj_arg7.Description: The time in frames that has to elapse before SW_DEAD gets activated. Default is -1.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_A.Description: If used, the object cannot be destroyed while this switch is not activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

DemoCast.Description: The object takes part in the cutscene. Its special cutscene functor action destroys it once triggered.

AppearPowerStar.Description: If Obj_arg3 is set to 3, this object will spawn a Power Star when destroyed.
